dct_description_sm: No. 35 (top right corner). Issued in his: Atlas historique, ou nouvelle introduction a l'histoire, à la chronologie ..., Tome I, [Map] No. 35. -- A Amsterdam : Chez les Freres Chatelain Libraires, Près de la Maison de Ville, 1705-1720.
No. 39 (top right corner). Reissued in his: Atlas historique, ou nouvelle introduction a l'histoire, à la chronologie ..., Vol. I, [Map] No. 39. -- Amsterdam : Z. Châtelain, 1732-1739.

California with indented northern coastline on small map of America on right edge of page with 4 vignettes of Spanish councils deciding the fate of the regions of America and with much descriptive text, and tables and data covering government of the various regions.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
